dcterms:creator: Hesham M. Eraqi
Yehya Abouelnaga
Mohamed H. Saad
Mohamed N. Moustafa
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of driving images clicked using a dash-camera installed inside the car over the front passenger seat. The dataset is composed of (1920,1080) RGB images extracted from videos that captured the side-view of 44 drivers. The dataset emulates a real-life black-box scenario since the driver has no access to the model that classifies their activities.
dcterms:title: AUC Distracted Driver dataset

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Vinod Nair
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L. Li
Kai Li
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale hierarchical image database with over 1.2 million images and 1,000 classes.
dcterms:title: Imagenet
